title: Effects of stigma on quality of life of cancer survivors: Preliminary evidence from a survivorship programme in Kenya
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Maureen J. Koech, Judy Mwangi, Benda Kithaka, Serah Kimaru, Ndinda Kusu, Lucy Munyi, Sidney Chahonyo, Francis Makokha
